name: columnValuesToBeBetween
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValuesToBeBetween. Test the values in a column to be between minimum and maximum value.

parameterDefinition.name: minValue
parameterDefinition.description: The {minValue} value for the column entry. If minValue is not included, maxValue is treated as upperBound and there will be no minimum number of rows

parameterDefinition.name: maxValue
parameterDefinition.description: The {maxValue} value for the column entry. if maxValue is not included, minValue is treated as lowerBound and there will eb no maximum number of rows
